absyn

Class ClassDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • absyn.Absyn
      • absyn.ClassDefinition

  • public class ClassDefinition
extends Absyn
    The abstract syntax of the definition of a Kitten class.
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassDefinition(int pos, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String superclassName, ClassMemberDeclaration declarations)
      Constructs the abstract syntax of the definition of a Kitten class.

    • Method Summary

      Adds, to the given class, the signatures of the fields, constructors and methods of this class definition.

      Writes in a file named as this class (plus the trailing .dot) a dot representation of the abstract syntax of this class.

      Yields the abstract syntax of the sequence of fields and methods declarations in this class definition, if any.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassDefinition

        public ClassDefinition(int pos,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String superclassName,
                       ClassMemberDeclaration declarations)
        Constructs the abstract syntax of the definition of a Kitten class.
        Parameters:
        pos - the starting position in the source file of the concrete syntax represented by this abstract syntax
        name - the name of the class
        superclassName - the name of the superclass
        declarations - the sequence of fields or methods declarations. This might be null

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Yields the name of the class defined with this abstract syntax.
        Returns:
        the name of the class defined with this abstract syntax

      • getSuperclassName

        public java.lang.String getSuperclassName()
        Yields the name of the superclass of the class defined with this abstract syntax.
        Returns:
        the name of the superclass of the class defined with this abstract syntax

      • getDeclarations

        public ClassMemberDeclaration getDeclarations()
        Yields the abstract syntax of the sequence of fields and methods declarations in this class definition, if any.
        Returns:
        the abstract syntax of the sequence of fields and methods declarations in this class definition, if any. Returns null if there is no declaration inside this class definition

      • getStaticType

        public ClassType getStaticType()
        Yields the static type of this class definition.
        Returns:
        the static type of this class definition. It yields null if type-checking has not been performed yet

      • toDot

        public final void toDot(java.io.FileWriter where)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes in the specified file a dot representation of the abstract syntax of this class. It writes the prefix specifying the paper size and orientation, then puts a node for this class definition, with three children corresponding to name, superclassName and declarations, if any. Then it builds the subtrees rooted at those children.
        Parameters:
        where - the file where the dot representation must be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error while writing into where

      • dumpDot

        public final void dumpDot(java.lang.String directory)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes in a file named as this class (plus the trailing .dot) a dot representation of the abstract syntax of this class.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory where the file must be dumped
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the dot file cannot be created

      • addMembersTo

        public void addMembersTo(ClassType clazz)
        Adds, to the given class, the signatures of the fields, constructors and methods of this class definition.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class where the signatures of fields, constructors and methods must be added

      • typeCheck

        public void typeCheck(ClassType currentClass)
        Type-checks this class definition. Namely, it type-checks its members and checks that the empty constructor exists.
        Parameters:
        currentClass - the semantical type of this class. This will be bound to the implicit this parameter of all its constructors and methods

      • translate

        public Program translate()
        Translates this class definition into intermediate Kitten code. Only the methods reachable from main are compiled, if any.
        Returns:
        the program reachable from the main method of the class compiled by Kitten
